custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SocialActivity WHERE (SocialActivity.userId = ?) OR (SocialActivity.receiverUserId = ?)
SELECT {SocialActivity.*} FROM SocialActivity WHERE (SocialActivity.userId = ?) OR (SocialActivity.receiverUserId = ?) ORDER BY SocialActivity.createDate DESC

SELECT DISTINCT {SocialActivity.*} FROM SocialActivity INNER JOIN SocialRelation ON ( (SocialRelation.userId1 = SocialActivity.userId) OR (SocialRelation.userId1 = SocialActivity.receiverUserId) ) OR ( (SocialRelation.userId2 = SocialActivity.userId) OR (SocialRelation.userId2 = SocialActivity.receiverUserId) ) WHERE (SocialActivity.userId != ?) AND (SocialRelation.type_ = ?) AND ( (SocialRelation.userId1 = ?) OR (SocialRelation.userId2 = ?) ) ORDER BY SocialActivity.createDate DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM SocialRelation WHERE ( (SocialRelation.userId2 = ?) OR (SocialRelation.userId1 = ?) ) AND (SocialRelation.type_ = ?)
SELECT {SocialRelation.*} FROM SocialRelation WHERE ( (SocialRelation.userId2 = ?) OR (SocialRelation.userId1 = ?) ) AND (SocialRelation.type_ = ?)

SELECT {SocialRelation.*} FROM SocialRelation WHERE ( (SocialRelation.userId1 = ?) AND (SocialRelation.userId2 = ?) AND (SocialRelation.type_ = ?) ) OR ( (SocialRelation.userId1 = ?) AND (SocialRelation.userId2 = ?) AND (SocialRelation.type_ = ?) )
SELECT {SocialRelation.*} FROM SocialRelation WHERE (SocialRelation.userId1 = ?) AND (SocialRelation.userId2 = ?) AND (SocialRelation.type_ = ?)
